Package Player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Butterfly, Caterpillar, Egg
public abstract class Player extends Object
Represents the player. To be expanded upon in other phases.
Author:
Asha

    • Player

      public Player​(int numCollectableNeedToEat, double x, double y, String design)
      Constructs an Player that is alive with the number of collectibles needed. The collectablesEaten should continue to increase regardless of phase.
      Parameters:
      numCollectableNeedToEat - - the int of collectibles that must be eaten
